发现为未来肥胖治疗提供了关键的分子靶标我们从吃垃圾食品中获得的乐趣 - 多巴胺从咸咸，油腻的炸薯条和甜美的汉堡倒下来狂奔 - 通常被归咎于我们社会中暴饮暴食和上升的肥胖率的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/discovery-provides-crucial-molecular-molecular-targets-for-future-future-mobesity-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/discovery-provides-cucial-molecular-molecular-targets-for-future-future-obesity-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1593096-9246-9246-45DA-A347-964C1047CFBD Wed, 26 Mar 2025 13:58:50 -0400 Discovery provides crucial molecular targets for future obesity treatments
轻度强度每日体育活动可能会降低癌症的风险在一项对英国85,000多名成年人的前瞻性队列研究中，美国国立卫生研究院（NIH）和牛津大学的研究人员发现，从事轻度和中度至中度强度的每日体育活动的个人比久坐的人较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/light-inlight-intense-daily-daily-physical-physical-activities-may-reduce-cancer-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/light-inlight-intense-daily-daily-physical-physical-activities-may-reduce-cancer-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1d74398-3c63-4797-997-99df-5A2AC0C88596 Wed, 26 Mar 2025 13:51:00 -0400 Light intensity daily physical activities may reduce cancer risk
研究人员确定与海洛因成瘾有关的关键基因阿片类药物使用障碍每年在全球范围内每年有超过350,000人死亡。在对成瘾的关键神经生物学特征的需求中的指导下，研究人员现在发现了与寻求海洛因的行为相关的轨道额叶皮质中的独特分子特征和基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/researchers-isendify-nistify-key-gene-ninked-to-heroin-addiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/researchers-isendify-nistify-key-gene-ninked-to-heroin-addiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5B70138A-91DB-472D-96AF-197A7A7DDD957B0 Wed, 26 Mar 2025 12:58:00 -0400 Researchers identify key gene linked to heroin addiction

研究强调了大脑数量处理的灵活性美国国家信息与通信技术研究所（NICT，总裁：Tokuda Hideyuki，Ph.D.）通过基于fMRI的大脑活动分析揭示了人类脑皮层中的多个地区灵活地代表数值数量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/study-highlights-the-the-flexible-nature-nature-nature-numerical-quantity-quantity-porcessing-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/study-highlights-the-the-flexible-nature-nature-nature-numerical-quantity-quantity-porcessing-in-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86201C9B-96D7-4EE2-85F5-4BA87CC7944E Wed, 26 Mar 2025 12:21:47 -0400 Study highlights the flexible nature of numerical quantity processing in the brain

希望之城研究人员发现了肿瘤形成的两步过程希望之城的研究人员是，美国新闻与世界报道的美国国家医疗中心（National Medical Center）最大，最先进的癌症研究和治疗机构之一，名为《全美癌症》中的前五名，他发现细胞突变是必要的，但并不总是足以形成肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/city-of-hope-researchers-uncover-uncover-the-two-step-process-process-of-tumor-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/city-of-hope-researchers-uncover-uncover-the-two-step-process-ercess-of-tumor-formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fb933ab6-bb24-4A57-907C-7998617A917F Wed, 26 Mar 2025 10:31:19 -0400 City of Hope researchers uncover the two-step process of tumor formation
